Cathay Pacific Media Tea Gathering Introduction to InFlight Waste Management and Sustainable Sourcing
Providing a comfortable journey to our passengers and helping them to live a Life Well Travelled requires the use of many different resources, from the utensils provided for inflight meals to the travel kits handed out during the flight. Do you ever think about what happens to such materials after each flight, or the effort that goes into producing inflight items in a more environmentally friendly way?
The effective management of resources and the reduction of energy consumption and wastage are important elements of Cathay Pacificâ€™s sustainability strategy. In our continuous strive to provide a premium service and to reduce the impact these services have on the environment, we have implemented a wide range of environmental initiatives, including the use of sustainable materials and the collection, classification, recycling and reuse of inflight items.
The Cathay Pacific Environmental Affairs Department is happy to share with the media more about practices relating to handling used inflight materials and sustainable sourcing.
Source:- Cathay Pacific
